name: Forests
description:
OVERVIEW

Nature provides us with comfort, life, and, most importantly, a home.

However, we take everything natures has given us for granted. Not only do we not appreciate the nature, we carelessly exploit it for our own benefits.

Due to human activities, there are about 111 trees that are cut down each second. But we hardly notice how bad deforestation is, living in our comfortable homes. 

This game will present deforestation in a unique perspective, and give you a taste of the rapid depletion of trees.

HOW TO PLAY

Left click or press space bar when a tree trunk is above another one. If you align the two perfectly, you tree trunk will grow bigger!
